Addon.name: V1.2 Ninja Armor
Addon.role: Ninja armor is a new minecraft addon than adds new ninja armors,  new swords and the new projectils (shiruren, kunai, ninja star, kama, mesibushi,and more). Everything can be obtained from survival. The addon has compatibility with the samurai armor addon you can check out at this link mcpedl.com/samurai-armor-addon-1/

Addon.name: Combastical Ninjas Addon
Addon.role: In here I bring you super strong mobs that are more formidable than any other mobs in MCBE. Today I will show you the very strong mobs, it will beat anything if you try it against other mobs. Well we can see if they are really strong or not, so they can be in a mob battle!!!

Addon.name: Ninja Pack
Addon.role: Do you want to be like a Ninja in Minecraft? Data Android/Minecraft/ninja/3/1.png Well this addon add items that ninja use Like shuriken, katana, sickle and more! This addon also add a Ninja that holds a katana!

Addon.name: WITHER DRAGON
Addon.role: WITHER DRAGON it's a ender dragon but it turns into wither then we called it wither dragon another Strong boss his not like normal wither boss his stronger than wither you can beat him if you are strong enough!

Addon.name: WITHER STORM...
Addon.role: Yes! Wither storm! Your dream comes true! I bring you this addon come in and see it!

Addon.name: Wither Patrols
Addon.role: Have you ever wanted a little more fun, danger, or maybe even action to Minecraft? If so, then this pack will help. Wither patrols allows the wither to spawn in the overworld automatically and wreak havoc, but don't worry, for your protection, we added Armored Villagers! These villagers use bows to attack any monster in sight, they can even defeat the wither. Just don't hit one, or else the Iron Golem and the Villager will attack you!

Addon.name: More Wither Addon
Addon.role: This addon adds mor ewither to Minecraft. You can only summon the withers though. All different wither drop the Nether star item. The different withers differs in damage from one another.

Addon.name: Wither Rose Addon
Addon.role: This add-on adds Java's Wither Rose that will eventually be in an upcoming updating for Minecraft: Bedrock Edition. Wither Roses are roses that give off the Wither effect when you walk into them. This add-on functions similarly to that of Java, except for a few differences and issues.

Addon.name: Baby Wither Skeletons [Addon]
Addon.role: Imagine adventuring out in the nether and you suddenly encounter Wither Skeletons, But not just that!

Addon.name: Wither Skeleton Knight Addon
Addon.role: In a recent update, we received the Piglin Brute, which is a very powerful version of the Piglin that guards the treasures inside Bastions and isn't afraid of anything. But what if there was also a more powerful wither skeleton?

Addon.name: Wither Storm Add-on
Addon.role: The Wither Storm Add-on turns the wither boss into a large and frightening boss known in Minecraft Story Mode as the Wither Storm. It's like 20 times larger than the wither boss and also much more powerful. It's the ultimate challenge for anyone considering themselves a good fighter and want to find out how far their skills can take them. If you have the guts to challenge it let us know in the comments if you survived!
Addon.file_url: https://kossandroid.com/Data Android/Minecraft/Wither/11/Wither Storm Purple Add-on v3_0.mcaddon

Addon.name: Wither Storm Addon (Killeable) V3

Addon.role: Do you want another Titan Monster? Now I bring you a new titan namely 'Black Demon Wither Skeleton Titan', or it can also be called Leader of the Wither Skeletons.

Addon.name: Biomobs Addon (1.16+)
Addon.role: This addon introduces 38 new mobs to fight in your survival worlds, this includes new variants for spiders, zombies, skeletons, Pillagers, and creeper! You can find them in Jungles, Frozen Biomes, Mushroom Islands, the End Dimension, and the Nether! Most of them even give harmful potion effects as well, so be careful!

Addon.name: Wolf Armor, Bars, Storage and Slot To Eat
Addon.role: You've complained about the delicate nature of wolves. This add-on has the option of craft enchantable armors to protect your wolves and the ability to store items in he. I hope u like.

Addon.name: Boomerangs Add-on (1.14+)
Addon.role: This add-on adds a new weapon in the game, a boomerang! There are other add-ons about this subject but this is my version. There are two types of boomerangs, a normal one and a piercing one. You can have fun with these new weapons just by throwing them around.

Addon.name: Nether Mobs Spawn (+1.16)
Addon.role: This addon integrates new ways to find the mobs of the 'nether fortress' and decreases the spawn of ghast in the Nether, makin 'they can only spawn in the soul sand valley biome.

Addon.name: Hardercore
Addon.role: Hardercore changes vanilla entity AI to challenge players. These AI changes can be increases to health, speed, projectiles, or new behaviors entirely. To reward players for surviving Hardercore, chests contain better equipment, mobs drop better loot, and most experience rewards are increased.

Map.name: Among Us Parkour Map
Map.role: Hey Guys Welcome to the Among Us Parkour map in this map you will parkouring all way to the end to press the emergency button to win and figure who's the imposter. Try to finish the map to able to win the game this will be the first among us parkour map in Minecraft Bedrock Edition.
Map.file_url: https://kossandroid.com/Data Android/Minecraft/Among Us/4/Among Us Parkour Map(2).mcworld

Map.name: Among Us Craft
Map.role: Hello everyone, I am from the maker of this minecraft folder will provide instructions on this map.  1. The first instruction, When entering the game, we may invite friends with a maximum of 5 players. and you can choose pets among us as you like. 2. Second instruction, when entering the arena, you can immediately carry out your task. If while you are undergoing a task, suddenly the security of Shield, O2, O2 in the admin, and in Reactor is interrupted, press the lever in security. 3. Third instruction, If you become Impostors, do your respective duties. 4. The fourth instruction, If you find a dead body or see an impostor killing, press the Emergency Meeting button in the Cafeteria. After pressing it, you are given the opportunity to vote as long as you want, if you choose who is the impostor, you take the golden sword in the chests and you push him and attack him to death and the sword appears then he is the impostor. If you don't know who the impostor is and haven't voted then you can skip voting and continue playing. If you want to exit the game, then you have to go to the Emergency Meeting and at the voting place there is a button with instructions, press the button you can leave the game.

Map.name: Among Us Maps Recreated In Minecraft
Map.role: This map includes my recreations of the Among Us maps Skeld, MIRA HQ, Polus, and The Airship. These will be fun to explore alone or play in with friends! You might be able to make these functional using command blocks, but for now their just there to look pretty.

Map.name: Among Us Map Builder
Map.role: Have you ever wondered how can you make your own Among Us levels? Well here's how! Using my creation, you can make your very own levels, play with your friends with it too!
Map.file_url: https://kossandroid.com/Data Android/Minecraft/Among Us/8/Among Us Map Template.mcworld

Map.name: MCBE Among Us v2 (NEW Revamped Vents, Bug Fixes & More!)
Map.role: Wanna play Among Us but in Minecraft? Now you can! This map works quite similarly to the actual Among Us and is fully functional. Play with 4 - 10 players! Find the Impostor, or finish your tasks!

Map.name: The Skeld Space Ship From the Game 'Among Us' - Exterior Only
Map.role: Ever played the game 'Among Us'? Always wanted to be in the Skeld ship where the game takes place? Well Here you go, I Created this World by Hand for you.  I've Done Both the Exterior and The Interior. Please make my work pay off. The Rest is up to you, Sir/Madam. Greetings! And we Shall Meet Again.

Map.name: AMONG CRAFT (Update)
Map.role: This map is based on the game Among Us. It has only THE SKELD map.  This map is also playable you can be CREWMATE or the IMPOSTOR. And here you can do tasks like scanning at the medbay and clicking the buttons on the diamond block.

Map.name: Among Us: The Skeld, Mira HQ & Polus! (All In One World) (No Mods)

Map.file_url: https://kossandroid.com/Data Android/Minecraft/Among Us/12/Among Us map by K&G.mcworld

Map.name: PPTG ULTRA WITHER

Map.name: Mini PvP Arena
Map.role: Reak havoc on your opponents! Are you looking for quick-paced exciting multiplayer battles? If so, this is the perfect world for you! With multiplayer compatibility, and a pre-made arena with already pre-equipped armor, swords, and Gapples, there's no need to wait or craft your weapons! Want to play in teams? No problem! Just go to the selection area and choose your team! People on the same team can't hurt each other, so band together and control the arena!

Map.name: Wandering Xisuma Trader
Map.role: Have you watched Hermitcraft? Then you'll know Xisuma one of the players and YouTubers of the server - This texture pack changes the pesky Wandering Trader to look like xisumavoid's new bee skin he has adopted since season 7

Map.name: Among Us Bedrock Edition V2
Map.role: This is mine and my friend's Skeld map on Minecraft Bedrock Edition, but it is a sequel to my original one! The map design is better, and the tasks are better, the sabotages are better, and your friendships will be worse! Thank me later.

Texture.name: Fixed Player Animation (Beta 0.1.0)

Texture.name: Kawaii Foods Add-on (B)

Texture.name: Kawaii Foods Add-on (R)
Texture.role: Tired of the same old minecraft food? This addon adds +50 different foods and some with effects that can be crafted or found in chests in your world. I'm sure you will like it!

Texture.name: Java 1.7 Animations V2
Texture.role: Do you hate the vanilla Bedrock Edition player animations and general feel of the new Bedrock, ever since 1.13.0? Or maybe you want yet another way to make Bedrock look and feel closer to Java Edition, especially for PVP. Look no further, because this pack makes many improvements and tweaks to player animations to more closely resemble Java edition 1.7 (and even bedrock 1.12.1!).

Texture.name: EPIC PvP Animations
Texture.role: Hello! I recently have been developing a PvP texture pack, and I added custom animations. However, some people didn't like some of the animations, so I decided to make this new pack that only modifies the animations.
